overview: Sandor, aka Sandman, is a modern day superhero often mistaken for Antonio Banderas. Although trained in sword fighting and gun-slinging, Sandor has spent the past year creating eRapport, a program to help Denmark plan and track energy projects required to meet EU efficiency mandates by 2012. In his spare time, Sandor collects superhero t-shirts and devotes much time to his wife and daughter and leads a media and design team for his company - Not-Available ( http://not-available.dk/ ).
